text:
The file bin/commons-daemon-native.tar.gz contains dirty (already compiled) code. On some systems this causes "make" to return the following error:

ar: libservice.a: Malformed archive

The solution is to run "make clean" before running "make".

I believe that "make clean" should be run before creating the tgz file, so that there are no compiled/generated files laying around.
creator: pas256@gmail.com
rainer.jung@kippdata.de
text:
This is a problem with the included version 1.0.2 of commons daemon and is being tracked under

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/DAEMON-154

Hopefully there will be a 1.0.3 release of commons daemon without this defect for the next Tomcat release.

You are right, the solution is to run "make clean" before "make".
6.0.x has been upgraded to daemon 1.0.3 which will be included in the 6.0.30 release.
creator: markt@apache.org

text: 6.0.x was upgraded to daemon 1.0.4. It will be in 6.0.30.
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
